Events.Text: Not again! You took the wrong bus and got totally lost in the middle of the city. But you have to get to your job interview in time! Ask you personal AI assistant for help. [instruction 1 of 5]
Help! I'm lost and I have to get to my job interview before I end up late. Can you help me?
The job interview is somewhere near Broadway and Main. If you can get there, you should know your way again. [instruction 2 of 5]
transit
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
A car would be fastest. I just need to get to Broadway and Main and I'll be able to figure it out from there.

Follow the way-instructions of the assistant and imagine you do what it says. But your sense of orientation is pretty bad and you cannot deal with instructions involving 'North', 'West', 'South', 'East'. So if that comes up, ask for more details. [instruction 3 of 5]

DetailedDrivingInstructions: Turn right at the subway station onto El Camino Real.
After 5 kilometers, you will see another subway station. Turn right onto Castro St, which is a one-way street.
Drive for 3 blocks and turn left just after you pass a park.
Your destination will be on the left opposite a bar.
DrivingInstructions: Turn right on El Camino Real
After 5 kilometers, turn right on Castro St.
Drive for 3 blocks and turn left
Your destination will be on the left.

Events.Text: Thank you and goodbye.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* At the beginning of the conversation, the user's location is 5th and Main
* At the beginning of the conversation it is 1pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
